feature.h
=========

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`Samgr <samgr.md>`__

**Description:**

Defines the base class of a feature.

This class is used to develop service features. It provides functions
for the feature lifecycle of a service.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------
